title: Chat Application
description: A modern, real-time chat web application built with Node.js, Socket.IO, and a clean, responsive UI. Users can join different topic-based rooms and communicate with others in real-time.

title: Serve-Ease (Capstone)
description: ServeEase is a modern, user-friendly home maintenance service app designed for seamless connections between users and trusted service providers. Built with security in mind, all data is fully encrypted to ensure privacy and protection. ServeEase offers a hassle-free experience, allowing users to browse, book, and manage home maintenance services with verified professionals. Whether it's plumbing, electrical work, or general repairs, ServeEase simplifies the process, ensuring reliability and convenience at every step.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app that provides real-time weather information based on city search or user location.
